duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the design and implementation of MEL Plan for the $50 Million EDGE Fund.
Create and manage databases for secure data storage.
Generate insights and recommendations based on data analysis.
Develop visually appealing and interactive data visualizations.
Manage UTRAMS intake database and oversee buy-in requests from Missions.
Support the development and maintenance of an Agency-wide PSE Mechanism Catalog.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field (Master's preferred)
